text: Ezɨ Hamanɨn amuim Seres ko, an namakaba nɨghnɨzir mam batogha ghaze, “Nɨ nɨghnɨgh osɨman markɨ. Nɨ gumazibav kemeghtɨ, me temer ruaritam asaragh, eghtɨ an ruarim 20 mitan tugh. Eghtɨ nɨ gurum bar mɨzaraghara mangɨ atrivim mɨkemegh egh Mordekai inigh an fɨrim dafagh an eguraghtɨ an aremegh. Nɨ kamaghɨn damigh, navir amɨrizim inigh mangɨ damam.” Haman mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam gifuegha gumazibav kemezɨ, me Mordekai guasa temer mam asara.
